data.message: Currently, my fb account is usurped. I tried to change my password and it went okay for a few days. But again my account is usurped, and both my email and password were changed by someone. Is there any other way to get my account back?

replies.message: Hi there. If your account has been taken over by someone else, please secure it here: http://bit.ly/2xyTOF4. You can also find detailed information about the tools and extra security features you can use to help keep your account secure on Privacy Basics at: http://bit.ly/2vKi8lt. -Ashley
